trans-unit.source: Represents a single touch input produced by a finger on a touchscreen.
trans-unit.target: Representerar ett enda touch indata som produceras av en fingeravtrycksläsare på en pekskärm.

trans-unit.source: You typically access a TouchDevice by using the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchEventArgs.TouchDevice%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Komma åt en TouchDevice normalt med hjälp av den <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchEventArgs.TouchDevice%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchEventArgs.TouchDevice%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A TouchDevice represents a single touch on a screen.
trans-unit.target: En TouchDevice representerar en enda knapptryckning på en skärm.

trans-unit.source: If multiple touches are present, use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Id%2A> property to distinguish between them.
trans-unit.target: Om flera touch använder den <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Id%2A>egenskapen för att skilja dem åt.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Id%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This class contains an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den här klassen innehåller en arv efterfrågan på klassnivå som gäller för alla medlemmar.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when the derived class does not have full-trust permission.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Security.SecurityException>när den härledda klassen inte har behörighet fullständigt betrodd.</xref:System.Security.SecurityException>

trans-unit.source: For more information about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om krav för säkerhet, se [länk krav](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) och [arv krav](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).

trans-unit.source: Called from constructors in derived classes to initialize the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Anropas från konstruktorer i härledda klasser för att initiera den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: A unique identifier for the touch device.
trans-unit.target: En unik identifierare för touch-enhet.

trans-unit.source: Adds the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref> to the input messaging system.
trans-unit.target: Lägger till den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref> inkommande meddelandesystem.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> should call this method to activate the current device.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som ärver från <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>ska anropa den här metoden om du vill aktivera den aktuella enheten.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: The device is already activated.
trans-unit.target: Enheten har redan aktiverats.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref> is added to the input messaging system.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref> har lagts till i den inkommande meddelandesystem.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"></xref> that is reporting input for this device.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"> </xref> som rapporterar indata för den här enheten.

trans-unit.source: The source that is reporting input for this device.
trans-unit.target: Källan som rapporterar indata för den här enheten.

trans-unit.source: Captures a touch to the specified element by using the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode"></xref> capture mode.
trans-unit.target: Samlar in en touch till det angivna elementet med hjälp av den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode"> </xref> bildtagningsläge.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> cannot be captured to an element if it is already captured to another element.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>inte kan avbildas till ett element om den redan har hämtats till ett annat element.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: The element that captures the touch input.
trans-unit.target: Det element som samlar in touch som indata.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element was able to capture the touch; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om elementet kunde fånga touch; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: element is not a , , or .
trans-unit.target: elementis not a , , or .

trans-unit.source: Captures a touch to the specified element by using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Samlar in en touch till det angivna elementet med hjälp av den angivna <xref href="System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> cannot be captured to an element if it is already captured to another element.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>inte kan avbildas till ett element om den redan har hämtats till ett annat element.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: The element that captures the touch.
trans-unit.target: Det element som samlar in touch.

trans-unit.source: The capture policy to use.
trans-unit.target: Avbilda princip du vill använda.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element was able to capture the touch; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om elementet kunde fånga touch; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: element is not a , , or .
trans-unit.target: elementis not a , , or .

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that captured the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar det element som avbildas av <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The element that captured the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Elementet som avbildas av <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the capture policy of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar princip för avbildning av den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The capture policy of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Avbilda principen för den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref> from the input messaging system.
trans-unit.target: Tar bort den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref> från angivna indata meddelandesystem.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> should call this method to deactivate the current device.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som ärver från <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>ska anropa den här metoden om du vill inaktivera den aktuella enheten.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchLeave> event is raised without the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp> event.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchLeave>händelsen inträffar utan motsvarande <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp>händelse.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchLeave>

trans-unit.source: The device is not activated.
trans-unit.target: Enheten har inte aktiverats.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref> is removed from the input messaging system.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref> tas bort från den ingående meddelandesystem.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that the touch contact point is directly over.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar det element som touch kontaktpunkten är direkt via.

trans-unit.source: The element that the touch contact point is directly over.
trans-unit.target: Det element som touch kontaktpunkten är direkt över.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns all touch points that are collected between the most recent and previous touch events.
trans-unit.target: När åsidosätts i en härledd klass returnerar alla touch punkter som samlas in mellan de mest aktuella och tidigare touch händelser.

trans-unit.source: The element that defines the coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: Det element som definierar koordinatsystem.

trans-unit.source: All touch points that were collected between the most recent and previous touch events.
trans-unit.target: Alla touch punkter som samlades in mellan de mest aktuella och tidigare touch händelser.

trans-unit.source: Returns the current position of the touch device relative to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar den aktuella positionen för touch-enheten i förhållande till det angivna elementet.

trans-unit.source: The element that defines the coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: Det element som definierar koordinatsystem.

trans-unit.source: The current position of the touch device relative to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Den aktuella positionen för touch-enheten i förhållande till det angivna elementet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the unique identifier of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref>, as provided by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den unika identifieraren för den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref>, som tillhandahålls av operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> represents a single touch on a screen.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>representerar en enda knapptryckning på en skärm.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: If multiple touches are present, use the Id property to distinguish between them.
trans-unit.target: Om det finns flera finputsningen, kan du använda Id-egenskapen för att skilja mellan dem.

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den unika identifieraren för den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the device is active.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om enheten är aktiv.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the device is active; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om enheten är aktiv. Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when a touch is captured to an element.
trans-unit.target: Anropas när en touch hämtas till ett element.

trans-unit.source: The OnCapture method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnCapture har ingen standardimplementering.

trans-unit.source: It can be overridden in a derived class to perform any actions that are required when the touch input is captured.
trans-unit.target: Den kan åsidosättas i en härledd klass för att utföra alla åtgärder som krävs när avbildas touch-indata.

trans-unit.source: The element that captures the touch input.
trans-unit.target: Det element som samlar in touch som indata.

trans-unit.source: The capture policy.
trans-unit.target: Avbilda principen.

trans-unit.source: Called when a manipulation has ended.
trans-unit.target: Anropas när en manipulering har avslutats.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to cancel the action; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>att avbryta åtgärden. Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when a manipulation is started.
trans-unit.target: Anropas när en manipulering har startats.

trans-unit.source: The OnManipulationStarted method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnManipulationStarted har ingen standardimplementering.

trans-unit.source: It can be overridden in a derived class to perform any actions that are required when touch manipulation is started.
trans-unit.target: Den kan åsidosättas i en härledd klass för att utföra alla åtgärder som krävs när touch manipulering har startats.

trans-unit.source: Reports that a touch is pressed on an element.
trans-unit.target: Rapporterar att en touch trycks på ett element.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> should call this method to raise the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown> event.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som ärver från <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>ska anropa den här metoden för att öka den <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown>händelse.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchEnter> event is raised before the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown> event.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchEnter>händelse utlöses innan den <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown>händelse.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchEnter>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown"></xref> event was handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown"> </xref> händelse har hanterats, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Reports that a touch is moving across an element.
trans-unit.target: Rapporter som en touch flytta över ett element.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> should call this method to raise the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove> event.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som ärver från <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>ska anropa den här metoden för att öka den <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove>händelse.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove"></xref> event was handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove"> </xref> händelse har hanterats, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Reports that a touch was lifted from an element.
trans-unit.target: Rapporterar att en touch hade upphävts från ett element.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> should call this method to raise the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp> event.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som ärver från <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>ska anropa den här metoden för att öka den <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp>händelse.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchLeave> event is raised after the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp> event.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchLeave>händelse utlöses efter att den <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp>händelse.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchLeave>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp"></xref> event was handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp"> </xref> händelse har hanterats, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"></xref> that is reporting input for this device.
trans-unit.target: Anger den <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"> </xref> som rapporterar indata för den här enheten.

trans-unit.source: The source that reports input for this device.
trans-unit.target: Källan som rapporterar indata för den här enheten.

trans-unit.source: Forces the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref> to synchronize the user interface with underlying touch points.
trans-unit.target: Framtvingar den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref> för att synkronisera användargränssnitt med underliggande touch punkter.

trans-unit.source: Synchronizing the user interface with the underlying touch positions might cause <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove> events to be raised.
trans-unit.target: Synkronisera användargränssnittet med underliggande touch positioner orsaka <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove>händelser som ska aktiveras.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove>

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.IManipulator"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar positionen för den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.IManipulator"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Den här medlemmen är en implementering för medlem av explicit gränssnitt.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator> interface.
trans-unit.target: Det kan användas endast när den <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>instans omvandlas till ett <xref:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator>gränssnitt.</xref:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: The element to use as the frame of reference for calculating the position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.IManipulator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Elementet ska användas som referens för ramens of för beräkningen av positionen för den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.IManipulator"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.IManipulator"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Positionen för den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.IManipulator"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: Gets the unique identifier of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref> as provided by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den unika identifieraren för den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref> som tillhandahålls av operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Den här medlemmen är en implementering för medlem av explicit gränssnitt.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator> interface.
trans-unit.target: Det kan användas endast när den <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>instans omvandlas till ett <xref:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator>gränssnitt.</xref:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den unika identifieraren för den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a manipulation has ended.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när en manipulering har avslutats.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Den här medlemmen är en implementering för medlem av explicit gränssnitt.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator> interface.
trans-unit.target: Det kan användas endast när den <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>instans omvandlas till ett <xref:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator>gränssnitt.</xref:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to cancel the action; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>att avbryta åtgärden. Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that receives input from the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar det element som tar emot indata från den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The element that receives input from the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Elementet som tar emot indata från den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a touch message is sent.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när en touch-meddelandet har skickats.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.
